com.ryanbrooks.expandablerecyclerviewsample.VerticalLinearRecyclerViewSample

Class CustomParentViewHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • com.bignerdranch.expandablerecyclerview.ViewHolder.ParentViewHolder
        • com.ryanbrooks.expandablerecyclerviewsample.VerticalLinearRecyclerViewSample.CustomParentViewHolder

  • public class CustomParentViewHolder
extends ParentViewHolder
    Custom parent ViewHolder. Any views should be found and set to public variables here to be referenced in your custom ExpandableAdapter later.

    Must extend ParentViewHolder

    Since:
    5/27/2015
